basic.description: A seminar on specific themes, theoretical issues or problems in Peninsular or Spanish American literature, as may serve the special research desires of individual students. In recent years, specific themes treated in this course have centered on La epopeya castellana and on La novela de la violencia en Colombia. By arrangement with the Head of Department. Three term-hours; Winter term. V. Garibotto.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Temas Especificos
